info.title: Read a checked checkbox in reading mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusAndCheckFirstCheckbox
setupScript.description: sets focus on the first checkbox and sets its state to checked

user: When the reading cursor is on the first checkbox, read the first checkbox.  Note: it should be in the checked state.
instructions.raw: When the reading cursor is on the first checkbox, read the first checkbox.  Note: it should be in the checked state.
instructions.mode: Insure NVDA is in browse mode by pressing Escape. Note: This command has no effect if NVDA is already in browse mode.

assertions.expectation: State of the checkbox ( checked) is conveyed
